doc.title: Congratulations on Your Impending Geography
doc.plot: In the summer of 2003, punk rock band Mara'akate headed east from Indiana, playing shows through to New York and then on to a five week European tour spanning twelve countries. This DVD captures the band on that tour both candidly and professionally. Through the feature, hilarious audio commentary, and its substantial extras, the experience is related to the viewer in total. A fun, engaging, and thorough look at a pivotal experience both collectively and individually for Mara'akate.
